functional.notes: Close gating enforces that PASS implies no required next steps and required evidence is present.
evidence: scripts/audit/audit_intent.mjs returns nonzero on errors and records errors[].
findings: With --require-quality-audit, requires intent-level and per-task quality audits.
Without it, close still enforces guardrails/audit evidence.

correctness_safety.notes: Gating prevents false positives and makes close deterministic.
findings: Failure messages point to missing artifacts.

performance.notes: Close checks are filesystem-bound and fast.
findings: No expensive computation beyond reading small JSON files.

security.notes: No external calls; verification is local.
findings: Safe inputs (intent id/run id) used for path joins.

maintainability.notes: Centralized gating logic keeps policy consistent.
findings: Clear place to add future evidence requirements.

summary.notes: Policy is clear; ensure user-facing errors remain stable for portal parsing (if any).
